accursed:Adaptability.NAME: Adaptability
accursed:Adaptability.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, gain !M! Block.
accursed:Adaptability.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Whenever you draw a Curse, gain !M! Block.

accursed:Jealousy.NAME: Jealousy
accursed:Jealousy.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be removed from your deck. NL Seal a random Curse.

accursed:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
accursed:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Discard all Curses. Deal !D! Damage, plus !M! for each Curse discarded.
